attributes.action: Close all schools to prevent COVID cases rising..
attributes.additional_details: We want this to happen because quite a lot of COVID cases are coming from schools and children are spreading it from person to person. Boris Johnson told the nation that we cannot see more than one person, however we are mixing with thousands of students from thousands of different households and spreading the virus even more. I hope you consider this action, you may not want to but this could help stop the spread and get schools and the nation back to normal!
attributes.background: We would like the government to close all schools to help prevent the spread of COVID—19 and keep our children and others safe.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Close all Schools and colleges and Universities during second lockdown: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557413

Close Schools and Colleges during a second nationwide lockdown: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557012

Force Universities to close commencing National Lockdown on November 5th 2020: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/558383

Reclose schools and colleges due to increase in COVID-19 cases: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/550846

Require university campuses to close to stop the spread of COVID-19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/552512
